title: Google OAuth login success
description: Verify that a user can successfully authenticate using Google OAuth via Firebase and receive a valid token

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Click on the Sign in with Google button
Select a valid Google account for authentication
User is authenticated and redirected to the dashboard
User token is generated and stored for subsequent requests

title: Google OAuth login failure handling
description: Verify that login failure due to canceled login or denied permissions is handled gracefully

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Click on the Sign in with Google button
Cancel the Google authentication or deny required permissions
User remains on login page or is shown an error message
No authentication token is generated or stored

title: Create new freelance task with valid inputs
description: Verify clients can create a freelance task specifying category, budget, deadline, and required skills successfully

steps.description: Login as a client user
Navigate to the task creation page
Fill in valid category, budget, deadline, and skill requirements
Submit the new task form
Task is created and visible in the client's task list

title: Edit existing task with valid changes
description: Verify clients can update an existing task's details and changes are saved persistently

steps.description: Login as a client user
Navigate to existing task detail page
Edit task fields with valid new values
Save the changes
Task details reflect the updated values when viewed again

title: Delete existing task
description: Verify clients can delete a task and it is removed from task listings

steps.description: Login as a client user
Navigate to the task list
Delete a selected task
Task no longer appears in task listings or client view

title: Freelancer multi-file submission with ZKP validation success
description: Verify freelancers can upload multiple files for a task and files pass zero-knowledge proof validation successfully

steps.description: Login as a freelancer user
Browse and select a task to submit files to
Upload multiple valid files for submission
Perform zero-knowledge proof validation on each file
All files are accepted and submission status is updated to submitted

title: ZKP validation failure on tampered file
description: Verify that zero-knowledge proof validation fails for an altered or invalid file and appropriate error is shown

steps.description: Login as freelancer user
Select a task and upload a file modified to fail ZKP validation
Trigger zero-knowledge proof verification
Validation fails and clear error message is presented to user
File is rejected and not included in submission

title: Client approves individual submitted files with proportional payment
description: Verify clients can approve individual files from a submission and the system correctly calculates proportional payments

steps.description: Login as client user
Navigate to task submissions
Review files submitted for a task
Approve one or more individual files
Approval status updates only for selected files
Payment system reflects correct proportional amount due

title: Ethereum wallet connection success and escrow payment flow
description: Verify users can connect their Ethereum wallet via MetaMask, interact with escrow smart contract, and complete payment claims

steps.description: Login as freelancer user
Connect Ethereum wallet using MetaMask
Wallet connection is successful and address displayed
Navigate to payment claim interface for approved files
Initiate escrow smart contract interaction to claim payment
ETH payments are successfully transferred to freelancer wallet

title: Role switching between client and freelancer updates UI and permissions
description: Verify dynamic role switch changes user interface and limits available actions accordingly without errors

steps.description: Login as a user with both client and freelancer roles
Switch user role to client
UI updates to client dashboard and client-specific options are available
Switch user role to freelancer
UI updates to freelancer dashboard with appropriate permissions
Actions unavailable for current role are blocked or hidden

title: Real-time update of submission, approval, and payment statuses
description: Verify that all relevant statuses update in real-time across all affected user views without page reload

steps.description: Login as client and freelancer in separate browsers or sessions
Freelancer submits files for a task
Client dashboard reflects new submission immediately
Client approves individual files
Freelancer dashboard shows updated approval status instantly
Freelancer claims payment
Client and freelancer interfaces update payment status in real-time

title: Multi-page routing with protected and role-based access
description: Verify that navigation and routing restrict access based on authentication and user role properly

steps.description: Attempt to access client dashboard without login
User is redirected to login page
Login as freelancer and try to access client-only pages
Access is denied or redirected to freelancer default page
Login as client and access client pages
Access granted and pages load correctly

title: UI responsiveness and accessibility on multiple device sizes
description: Verify the application UI components render correctly and are usable on various screen sizes and meet accessibility standards

steps.description: Open the application on desktop, tablet, and mobile devices
UI elements adapt layout properly for each screen size
Interactive components are accessible via keyboard and screen readers
Color contrast and font sizes meet accessibility guidelines

title: Loading states and error handling feedback
description: Verify that all loading states and error scenarios provide clear and user-friendly feedback without UI freezing or crashes

steps.description: Trigger network delay during login, task loading, or submission
Loading indicators are displayed appropriately
Simulate backend API failure during any CRUD operation
A clear error message is shown and user can retry or cancel action
Trigger blockchain transaction failure (e.g. MetaMask rejection)
Error is handled gracefully with user notification

title: Onboarding flow triggers only on first user login
description: Verify that welcome messages and celebratory animations are shown only once when a new user logs in for the first time

steps.description: Login as newly registered user
Onboarding welcome flow with animations is displayed
Logout and login again with the same user
Onboarding flow does not trigger again

title: Multi-file secure download after client approval
description: Verify freelancers can securely download individually approved files and files that are not approved are not accessible

steps.description: Login as freelancer
Navigate to submitted files for a task
Approved files have active download links
Unapproved files do not allow download
Download an approved file
Downloaded file integrity is verified and uncorrupted

title: Task creation validation error for missing required fields
description: Verify the system blocks task creation and displays appropriate validation messages if required fields are missing or invalid

steps.description: Login as client
Navigate to create task page
Attempt to submit form with empty or invalid budget, deadline, or skills fields
Form displays clear validation errors preventing submission
